item.description:
New to Steppin?
Need help with those basics?
This Workshop is for Steppers under 1 year , Beginners and New Recruits and those who want a review
We want you on the dance floor ASAP....

Steppers under 1 year will be able to further enhance their skills
Beginners and New Recruits will start their Steppin addiction
Workshop will start at 8:30am SHARP to 10:30am.

The fee for this workshop is $30 per person


** 2 for 1 special at $50 = Any 1 workshop and Friday Line Dance/Walking class (The Sunday class has Sold Out).

See Lady Val to make your cash or check purchase to reserve your place in the workshops and classes. Or purchase this workshop via PayPal using your credit card. Or mail a check (payable to Steppers of Boston) to
Steppers of Boston
42 Wheeler Circle #41
Stoughton, MA 02072

Choice of:

Friday April 9th - Line Dancing Class - 8pm - 10pm at Max's Blues Cafe

or
NO LONGER A OPTION

Sunday April 11th - Footwork Class open to All - 10am - 12 at Verve SOLD OUT

Parking Validation 2 hours Free

Pay Pal accepted. Please note: There will be a $2 surcharge added for credit card transactions

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: STEPPIN 101 - Workshop with Sarah Teagle and MeMe 8:30am - 10:30am
